notesStmt.note: Stained. Paper darkening at edges and foxing. Ink flaking, and text area often brown all over.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental semi-cursive script of the 18th century.

binding.p: Post-1600 (contemporary with the manuscript). Dark red leather with gold tooling. Boxed. Spine: 'Derush Hat-Tanninim. Etc. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Or. 4536.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: M. Herz: purchased from him by the British Museum on 11 January 1892: inscribed, folio [121v] (fse004v).
